cards.html:
Out of nowhere, Capcom has decided to bring their critically-acclaimed action RPG to Nintendo Switch.

 

Will you be getting Dragon’s Dogma: Dark Arisen on April 23? Let us know in the Comments section below.

Be sure to like us on Facebook in order to get updated on every article we post, along with more Nintendo content. And if you’d like to see more, why not check out why Nintendo are NOT going to be giving up on the console market?
